title: Bride of the Water God, Volume 8
description: Ambiguous loyalties, vengeful old flames, and the schemes of jealous gods fill Bride of the Water God Volume 8 with heartbreak and intrigue! After Soah is kidnapped from the magical land of Suguk, Habaek - the cursed, lovelorn Water God - is forced to reconcile long-suppressed feelings for Nakbin, his dead bride, with strong, new yearnings for Soah. Writer/artist Mi-Kyung Yun's Bride of the Water God series has surprised voracious romance readers with its breathtaking artwork, intricate plot threads, and multi-faceted characters.
author: Mi-Kyung Yun
